name: Comodo Virus Definitions File
summary: Learn about .CAV files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: CAV files commonly have the name bases.cav and are located in the following installation directory: COMODO\​COMODO Internet Security\​scanners

description: File used by Comodo Internet Security, a free antivirus program used to protect computers against malware; contains signatures that are used to recognize viruses; used to update virus definitions when new viruses are discovered.
